## Setup
```{r setup}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

```

## Data import and tidying

Loading in and tidying data: 
```{r}

asthma_data = read_csv(file = "./final_data/asthma_data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(data_value != "NULL") %>% 
  rename(year = year_description) %>% 
  mutate(
    data_value = as.numeric(data_value),
    year = as.factor(year)
    ) %>% 
  drop_na(year)  
 
```

We removed entries that included non-numerical year values. The resulting dataset contains 5,796 entries across 9 variables.
